description: Updates the instance protection settings of the specified instances. This operation cannot be called on instances in a warm pool. For more information, see Use instance scale-in protection in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide. If you exceed your maximum limit of instance IDs, which is 50 per Auto Scaling group, the call fails.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: One or more instance IDs. You can specify up to 50 instances. (string) ---

parameters.name: AutoScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

parameters.name: ProtectedFromScaleIn
parameters.description: Indicates whether the instance is protected from termination by Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling when scaling in.
